## Biography

Hi! I am Bo Li, a bioinformatician and associated professor in Chongqing Normal University, China. Before coming to Chongqing, I was a teacher at Wuhan Bioengineering Institute, mainly teaching molecular biology.

## Education

- **Ph.D. in Bioinformatics** | *Chongqing University of China* | Sep. 2013 - Jun. 2017

- **M.S. in Biophysics** | *Chongqing University of China* | Sep. 2010 - Jun. 2013

- **B.S. in Bioengineering** | *Northwest A&F University of China* | Sep. 1999 - Jul. 2003

## Experience

- **Principle Investigator (AP)** | *Chongqing Normal University* | January 2020 - Present

- **Lecturer** | *Chongqing Normal University* | July 2017 - June 2019

- **Faculty Member** | *Wuhan Bioengineering Institute* | July 2004 - June 2010

- **Lab Technician** | *Academy of Military Medical Sciences* | July 2003 - May 2004

## Research

- Machine learning methodology in biomedicine

- Developing bioinformatics database & software

- AI and drug discovery
